derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin chrysoberyllus, from Greek khrusos 'gold' + bērullos 'beryl'

means.word_mean: 1. a rare hard yellow green mineral consisting of beryllium aluminate in crystal form; used as a gemstone
